title: Lexicon Reference
description: A reference to an item in a lexicon.

lexicon.title: Referenced Lexicon
lexicon.description: The abbreviation of the lexicon being referenced.

lexeme.title: Referenced Lexeme Key
lexeme.description: The key of the lexeme being referenced.

sense.title: Referenced Sense
sense.description: The number of the sense being referenced. The sense number is its index in the `senses` array on the lexeme.

form.title: Referenced Form
form.description: The number of the form being referenced. The form number is its index in the `forms` array on the lexeme.
